fr.upmc.datacenter.software.admissioncontroller

Class AdmissionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.upmc.datacenter.software.admissioncontroller.AdmissionController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.upmc.components.ComponentI, AdmissionRequestHandlerI

    public class AdmissionController
extends fr.upmc.components.AbstractComponent
implements AdmissionRequestHandlerI

    Description

    This component AdmissionController receives the requests from the Costumers in this context we can consider Costumers as ApplicationContainer who want to host their applications RequestI of the RequestGenerator. the controller can accept if there is some available resources or refuse if all computers are busy on handling the requests of other Costumers. This Class knows the state of all computers available, Many methods can check the state of Cores of Processors.
    Version:
    2017.10.20.HK
    Author:
    Hacene Kasdi & Marc REN
